scenario: I'm in Miami and need to send a common medium-sized box today, so I want to compare the flat-rate shipping cost with other parcel services to decide which carrier to use. If UPS is the chosen carrier, I also need to find the nearest UPS drop-off point in Miami, Florida.
combined_task: Compare flat-rate shipping cost for a common medium-sized box against other parcel services and identify the nearest UPS drop-off point in Miami, Florida if UPS is selected.
selected_subtasks: Find a UPS drop-off point near Miami Florida.
Find the shipping cost of a Common medium-sized box in flat-rate shipping and compare it with other parcel services.
